body: What kind of fucking retard..? "Hey, help me get the woman I like by having sex with her too!" Yeah that's what I want, the woman I'm interested in to have her mouth and asshole filled with other dudes jizz. Gross and disgusting. Also, with how she kept going on about how she belongs to everyone, you bet your ass she ain't gonna be loyal. Bet 90% chance that kid ain't his. Have fun with that slut.
It was such a heartwarming story, i thought i was gonna cry~
